channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The uncomfortable secret of successful people: Forget work-life balance, you have to be ‘obsessed’, ex-Wall Streeter and business coach says
item.description: “Obsession means that you’re thinking nonstop until your relentless action makes it unreasonable for you to not win,” she says.

item.title: 7 Habits That Make You Look Unprofessional in Meetings
item.description: Bad meeting behaviors can easily undermine your professional image without you even knowing it.

item.title: These tiny ‘bat bots’ can see in the dark, fly through smoke, and might save your life one day
item.description: “Bats are amazing,” Nitin Sanket, assistant professor of robotics engineering said. “We are nowhere close to what nature has achieved."

item.title: America’s officially running out of pennies — and it’s costing retailers millions
item.description: “Let’s rip the waste out of our great nation’s budget, even if it’s a penny at a time,” President Donald Trump wrote on Truth Social.
